title: Shoe store sales in the United States from 1992 to 2017
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 26 data points.
In general Billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Billion U.S. dollars, about 36.2 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Billion U.S. dollars, of value 18.62 was reported at Year 1992
